Esquema.Header:
<SAMI>
<HEAD>
<TITLE>SAMI Example</TITLE>

<SAMIParam>
  Media {cheap44.wav}
  Metrics {time:ms;}
  Spec {MSFT:1.0;}
</SAMIParam>

<STYLE TYPE="text/css">
<!--
  P { font-family: Arial; font-weight: normal; color: blue; background-color: black; text-align: center; }
  #Source {color: red; background-color: blue; font-family: Courier; font-size: 12pt; font-weight: normal; text-align: left; }
  .ENUSCC {Name: English; lang: en-US; color: red; margin-left: 30pt; margin-right: 30pt;}
-->
</STYLE>
</HEAD>
<BODY>
